# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-vnfm-huawei-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/hw-vnfmadapter-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/hw-vnfmadapter-deployment-1.1.0-20161213.032527-19.zip" && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-vnfm-huawei-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-vnfm-huawei-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8482
RUN echo Open-O nfvo-driver-vnfm-huawei 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/hw-vnfmadapter-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/hw-vnfmadapter-deployment-1.1.0-20161213.032527-19.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
